TopicTitle: Stock command pod assets for custom IVA's?

Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I picked up ASET's props and RPM to make a custom IVA for the inline command pod, but no actual unity files are present to edit!

I've seen people modify stock pods before, but I have no clue where they get the source files for them!

You need to use Squad's PartTools package with unity in order to place props in the IVA's. Once you get those two, link a KSP directory (one that contains the IVA's and Props(new ones included)) and you should be able to set up the custom props.
I've also give you link to a tutorial in you other post
